Description: Icon-only buttons must have accessible names
All form controls need labels or aria-label
Interactive elements must support keyboard interaction
Use semantic HTML before ARIA attributes
Async updates need aria-live for screen readers
Decorative icons should be hidden from screen readers
All interactive elements need visible focus states
Never remove outline without providing replacement
Checkbox/radio must share hit target with label
Inputs need autocomplete attribute for autofill
Use semantic input type attributes
Never prevent paste functionality
Disable spellcheck on emails and codes
Keep submit enabled and show spinner during requests
Show error messages inline near the problem field
Do: Inline error with focus on first error

Description: Virtualize lists exceeding 50 items
Do: Use virtual list for large datasets

Description: Avoid layout reads during render phase
Do: Read layout in effects or callbacks

Description: Group DOM operations to minimize reflows
Add preconnect links for CDN domains
Lazy-load images below the fold
URL should reflect current UI state
Stateful components should support deep-linking
Do: Enable sharing current view via URL

Description: Destructive actions require confirmation
Use proper Unicode characters
Handle text overflow properly
Use non-breaking spaces for units and brand names
Never disable zoom in viewport meta
Avoid transition: all - specify properties
Never use outline-none without replacement
Use Intl for date/number formatting
Non-text elements (icons/borders/controls) need 3:1 contrast ratio
Do: Ensure icons and UI controls have 3:1 contrast against background
Don't: Use light grey icons on white background

Description: Provide skip-to-content link for keyboard users
Do: Add visually hidden skip link as first focusable element
Don't: No skip link on pages with complex navigation

Description: Use aria-live regions to announce dynamic content changes
Do: Use aria-live='polite' for non-urgent updates and 'assertive' for critical
Don't: No announcement when content changes dynamically
Code Example Bad: Toast appears with no screen reader announcement

Description: Respect prefers-reduced-motion media query for all animations
Do: Provide reduced or no animation alternative for motion-sensitive users
Don't: Ignore motion preferences for decorative animations

Description: Use :focus-visible instead of :focus to show focus rings only for keyboard
Do: Show focus rings on keyboard navigation but not on mouse click
Don't: Remove all focus outlines for visual cleanliness

Description: Modal dialogs must trap focus and restore it when closed
Do: Use dialog element or implement focus trap with inert on background
Don't: Allow tab to escape modal to background content
Code Example Good: <dialog> with inert on body, return focus on close

Description: Use modern image formats with responsive srcset and lazy loading
Do: Use next/image or picture element with WebP/AVIF and lazy loading

Description: Use font-display: swap to prevent invisible text during font load
Do: Set font-display: swap in @font-face or Google Fonts URL parameter
Don't: Use font-display: block causing invisible text flash

Description: Add preconnect for external origins used early in page load
Do: Add preconnect for Google Fonts and CDN domains
Don't: Load external resources without preconnect hints
Code Example Bad: No preconnect for external CSS/font/API domains

Description: Prevent Cumulative Layout Shift by reserving space for dynamic content
Do: Use aspect-ratio and explicit width/height on images and embeds
Don't: Load images/embeds without dimensions causing layout shift

Description: Use virtualization for lists with 100+ items to avoid DOM bloat
Do: Use react-window or tanstack-virtual for long lists
Don't: Render 1000+ DOM nodes in a single list

Description: Use autocomplete attributes to help browsers auto-fill form fields
Don't: No autocomplete attributes on login/signup forms

Description: Associate error messages with form controls using aria-describedby
Do: Use aria-describedby pointing to error message element
Don't: Show generic error at top of form with no field association
Code Example Bad:
Fix errors above

at form top

Description: Provide password visibility toggle button with proper a11y
Do: Add toggle button with aria-label that changes with state
Don't: No password visibility option or toggle without aria-label

Description: Account for sticky/fixed headers when scrolling to anchors
Do: Add scroll-padding-top to html equal to sticky header height
Don't: Anchor links scroll content behind sticky header

Description: Account for device safe areas (notch/home indicator) on mobile
Do: Use env(safe-area-inset-*) for padding on edge-to-edge layouts
Don't: Ignore safe areas causing content under notch/home bar
Code Example Bad: Content hidden behind iPhone home indicator

Description: Use container queries for truly reusable responsive components
Do: Use container-type: inline-size for component-level breakpoints
Don't: Use viewport media queries inside component CSS

Description: Use clamp() for fluid typography that scales between breakpoints
Do: Use font-size: clamp(min preferred max) for smooth scaling
Don't: Use fixed font sizes with abrupt breakpoint changes

Description: Use proper heading hierarchy and landmark elements
Do: One h1 per page with sequential heading levels and nav/main/footer
Don't: Skip heading levels or use multiple h1 elements

Description: Include essential meta tags and OpenGraph data for social sharing
Don't: Missing meta description or og:image for shared pages
Code Example Bad: No og:image causing blank social previews
